messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.exp
LGTM although the issue tracker works too and provides a single source of knowledge

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2cd982aef585&repo=exp ***

go.exp/go/types: document known bugs

R=adonovan, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7962043

just one speling nit

https://codereview.appspot.com/7962043/diff/9005/go/types/api.go
File go/types/api.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7962043/diff/9005/go/types/api.go#newcode23
go/types/api.go:23: // BUG(gri): Unterface vs non-interface comparisons are not correctly implemented.
s/Unterface/Interface/

https://codereview.appspot.com/7962043/diff/9005/go/types/api.go
File go/types/api.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7962043/diff/9005/go/types/api.go#newcode28
go/types/api.go:28: // BUG(gri): The type-checker assumes that the input *ast.Files were created by go/parser.
See also the bugs listed in the go/types wishlist doc.
One or two are already covered by your list but most are not. 

https://docs.google.com/a/google.com/document/d/1-DQ4fxlMDs9cYtnkKhAAehX6MArjOQyJsRXp-6kiJLA/edit?pli=1#

https://codereview.appspot.com/7962043/diff/9005/go/types/api.go#newcode39
go/types/api.go:39: 
See also the API issues, simplifications and other things listed in the go/types wishlist doc.

subject: code review 7962043: go.exp/go/types: document known bugs
